title: hyipmaker11
author: hyipmaker11
content: Hello,My Name is Jhon Smith.I have a lot of knowledge about GC HYIP Templates. We are working on GC HYIP Template designing for the last 13+ years. If anybody wants any help regarding GC HYIP Templates, Feel free to contact me here.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: We've been warning people about investing in HYIP High-Yield Investment Program and members are tagging or reporting HYIPs' and yet you are here openly promoting your HYIP templates.You are encouraging and helping scammers to scam people, HYIPs' are a fraudulent business platformaccording to Investopedia.QuoteA high-yield investment program (HYIP) is a fraudulent investment scheme that purports to deliver extraordinarily high returns on an investment.HYIPs often advertise yields of more than 100% per year in order to tempt investors. They regularly use new investors' money to pay off long-standing investors. Monies received in such schemes aren't actually invested.What Is a High-Yield Investment Program (HYIP)?Anyone who's helping a scammer is considered a scammer too whether they are promoters, or template sellers like you.

comments.author: hyipmaker11
comments.body: Hello robelneo,Sorry for the delayed reply. do you know how many banks are already collapse in US in 2024 ?This is the small list. Washington Mutual Failure. ...First Republic Bank Failure. ...IndyMac Bank Failure. ...Continental Illinois National Bank and Trust Failure. ...Silicon Valley Bank Failure. ...Signature Bank Failure.All BANKS have his own websites. As per you, all these website developers are cheaters?We are just Template designers. We are not asking anyone to cheat others.  or we are not asked to invest in HYIPs. So, if you don't know about HYIP and how it works, do not post anything here.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: hyipmaker11 on May 28, 2024, 10:29:39 AMdo you know how many banks are already collapse in US in 2024 ?Are you really comparing Banks with HYIP scams?QuoteWe are just Template designers. We are not asking anyone to cheat others.  or we are not asked to invest in HYIPs.Is it possible that you don't have any better ideas other than that of cooperating with fraudsters and making websites from them?A few days ago Tornadocash developer was convicted, although he only coded the platform and had no influence on the fact that criminals used it. QuoteSo, if you don't know about HYIP and how it works, do not post anything here.It is a scam scheme and that is enough to know about the entire industry and the people who are involved in it in any way.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: hyipmaker11 on May 28, 2024, 10:29:39 AMHello robelneo,Sorry for the delayed reply.I'm ok if you did not show up to respond or it took you that long to think of a good replyQuotedo you know how many banks are already collapse in US in 2024 ?This is the small list. Washington Mutual Failure. ...First Republic Bank Failure. ...IndyMac Bank Failure. ...Continental Illinois National Bank and Trust Failure. ...Silicon Valley Bank Failure. ...Signature Bank FailureAll BANKS have his own websites. As per you, all these website developers are cheaters?We are just Template designers. We are not asking anyone to cheat others.  or we are not asked to invest in HYIPs. Are you that ignorant and so naive this is the stupidest answer I've come across here in this forum you are helping scammers to do their thing with your template and of course, you design to make it attractive so people will invest. You will be out of business if people stop investing in HYIPQuoteSo, if you don't know about HYIP and how it works, do not post anything here. I used to be a senior member of the old forum Moneymakergroup and investing in HYIP is one of the platforms I invest in so I know 100% how it works.

comments.author: CCMS
comments.body: HYIP is not a good practice at all. Use something else but just do not get involved with HYIP.
